about.name: Sammy Lee
about.title: Full-Time Student @ Boston College
about.intro: Sammy Lee is an full-time student studying computer science and studio arts at Boston College. His passion is to find ways to incorporate artisitic visions into computer science. He mainly focueses on front-end development with an interest in web development. As a Boston-based artist, he also practices painting, sketching, and installation art on the side.

projects.title: TCK (Three Country Kill): Multiplayer online card game
